text: Paul [strongs id="g3972" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] Silvanus [strongs id="g4610" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] Timotheus [strongs id="g5095" /], unto the church [strongs id="g1577" /] of the Thessalonians [strongs id="g2331" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] Father [strongs id="g3962" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] the Lord [strongs id="g2962" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /]:
